# BufferForeachMetaFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate bool BufferForeachMetaFunc(IntPtr buffer, out IntPtr meta, IntPtr user_data);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| buffer | Transfer ownership: none |
| meta | Transfer ownership: full; Nullable: true |
| user_data | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
